jobTransform.jobTransformCmd: export LD_PRELOAD=/afs/cern.ch/sw/lcg/external/libunwind/5c2cade/${CMTCONFIG}/lib/libunwind.so ; athena.py --stdcmalloc --leak-check-execute -c 'menu="Physics_pp_v6";checkLeak=True;jp.AthenaCommonFlags.EvtMax.set_Value_and_Lock(10);jp.Rec.doDetailedPerfMon.set_Value_and_Lock( False ) ; jp.Rec.doSemiDetailedPerfMon.set_Value_and_Lock( False ); from PerfMonComps.PerfMonFlags import jobproperties ; jobproperties.PerfMonFlags.doMonitoring.set_Value_and_Lock( False ) ; jp.Rec.OutputLevel=WARNING;LVL1OutputLevel=WARNING;HLTOutputLevel=WARNING;include("TriggerTest/TriggerTestSilence.py");dsName="/eos/atlas/atlascerngroupdisk/trig-daq/validation/test_data/mc12_8TeV.119994.Pythia8_A2MSTW2008LO_minbias_inelastic.recon.RDO.e1119_a185_a187_tid00998581_00";fileRange=[0,20]' TriggerTest/testCommonSliceAthenaTrigRDO.py

export LD_PRELOAD=/afs/cern.ch/sw/lcg/external/libunwind/5c2cade/${CMTCONFIG}/lib/libunwind.so ; athena.py --stdcmalloc --leak-check-execute -c 'menu="Physics_pp_v6_tight_physics_prescale";checkLeak=True;jp.AthenaCommonFlags.EvtMax.set_Value_and_Lock(10);jp.Rec.doDetailedPerfMon.set_Value_and_Lock( False ) ; jp.Rec.doSemiDetailedPerfMon.set_Value_and_Lock( False ); from PerfMonComps.PerfMonFlags import jobproperties ; jobproperties.PerfMonFlags.doMonitoring.set_Value_and_Lock( False ) ; jp.Rec.OutputLevel=WARNING;LVL1OutputLevel=WARNING;HLTOutputLevel=WARNING;include("TriggerTest/TriggerTestSilence.py");dsName="/eos/atlas/atlascerngroupdisk/trig-daq/validation/test_data/mc12_8TeV.105200.McAtNloJimmy_CT10_ttbar_LeptonFilter.digit.RDO.e1513_s1499_s1504_d700_tid01177880_00";fileRange=[1,20]' TriggerTest/testCommonSliceAthenaTrigRDO.py

export LD_PRELOAD=/afs/cern.ch/sw/lcg/external/libunwind/5c2cade/${CMTCONFIG}/lib/libunwind.so ; athena.py --stdcmalloc --leak-check-execute -c 'menu="MC_pp_v6";checkLeak=True;jp.AthenaCommonFlags.EvtMax.set_Value_and_Lock(10);jp.Rec.doDetailedPerfMon.set_Value_and_Lock( False ) ; jp.Rec.doSemiDetailedPerfMon.set_Value_and_Lock( False ); from PerfMonComps.PerfMonFlags import jobproperties ; jobproperties.PerfMonFlags.doMonitoring.set_Value_and_Lock( False ) ; jp.Rec.OutputLevel=WARNING;LVL1OutputLevel=WARNING;HLTOutputLevel=WARNING;include("TriggerTest/TriggerTestSilence.py");dsName="/eos/atlas/atlascerngroupdisk/trig-daq/validation/test_data/mc12_8TeV.105200.McAtNloJimmy_CT10_ttbar_LeptonFilter.digit.RDO.e1513_s1499_s1504_d700_tid01177880_00";fileRange=[1,20]' TriggerTest/testCommonSliceAthenaTrigRDO.py

export LD_PRELOAD=/afs/cern.ch/sw/lcg/external/libunwind/5c2cade/${CMTCONFIG}/lib/libunwind.so ; athena.py --stdcmalloc --leak-check-execute -c 'menu="MC_pp_v6_tight_mc_prescale";checkLeak=True;jp.AthenaCommonFlags.EvtMax.set_Value_and_Lock(10);jp.Rec.doDetailedPerfMon.set_Value_and_Lock( False ) ; jp.Rec.doSemiDetailedPerfMon.set_Value_and_Lock( False ); from PerfMonComps.PerfMonFlags import jobproperties ; jobproperties.PerfMonFlags.doMonitoring.set_Value_and_Lock( False ) ; jp.Rec.OutputLevel=WARNING;LVL1OutputLevel=WARNING;HLTOutputLevel=WARNING;include("TriggerTest/TriggerTestSilence.py");dsName="/eos/atlas/atlascerngroupdisk/trig-daq/validation/test_data/mc12_8TeV.105200.McAtNloJimmy_CT10_ttbar_LeptonFilter.digit.RDO.e1513_s1499_s1504_d700_tid01177880_00";fileRange=[1,20]' TriggerTest/testCommonSliceAthenaTrigRDO.py

export LD_PRELOAD=/afs/cern.ch/sw/lcg/external/libunwind/5c2cade/${CMTCONFIG}/lib/libunwind.so ; athena.py --stdcmalloc --leak-check-execute -c 'menu="MC_pp_v6_loose_mc_prescale";checkLeak=True;jp.AthenaCommonFlags.EvtMax.set_Value_and_Lock(10);jp.Rec.doDetailedPerfMon.set_Value_and_Lock( False ) ; jp.Rec.doSemiDetailedPerfMon.set_Value_and_Lock( False ); from PerfMonComps.PerfMonFlags import jobproperties ; jobproperties.PerfMonFlags.doMonitoring.set_Value_and_Lock( False ) ; jp.Rec.OutputLevel=WARNING;LVL1OutputLevel=WARNING;HLTOutputLevel=WARNING;include("TriggerTest/TriggerTestSilence.py");dsName="/eos/atlas/atlascerngroupdisk/trig-daq/validation/test_data/mc12_8TeV.119994.Pythia8_A2MSTW2008LO_minbias_inelastic.recon.RDO.e1119_a185_a187_tid00998581_00";fileRange=[0,20]' TriggerTest/testCommonSliceAthenaTrigRDO.py

athena.py --config-only=valgrind.pkl TriggerTest/testCommonSliceAthenaTrigRDO.py ; cp /afs/cern.ch/user/k/krasznaa/public/valgrind/pythonJobO.supp ./ ; cp /afs/cern.ch/user/k/krasznaa/public/valgrind/reflexPyROOT.supp ./ ; cp $ROOTSYS/etc/valgrind-root.supp ./ ; get_files newSuppressions.supp; get_files oracleDB.supp; get_files root.supp; get_files valgrindRTT.supp; get_files Gaudi.supp; get_files valgrind-python.supp ; valgrind --suppressions=valgrind-root.supp --track-origins=yes --trace-children=yes --suppressions=newSuppressions.supp --suppressions=oracleDB.supp --suppressions=root.supp --suppressions=valgrindRTT.supp --suppressions=Gaudi.supp --suppressions=valgrind-python.supp --suppressions=pythonJobO.supp --suppressions=reflexPyROOT.supp --error-limit=no --tool=memcheck --leak-check=full --smc-check=all --show-reachable=yes --num-callers=30 `which athena.py` --stdcmalloc -c 'RunningRTT=True;menu="Physics_pp_v6";jp.AthenaCommonFlags.EvtMax.set_Value_and_Lock(2); jp.Rec.doPerfMon.set_Value_and_Lock( False ) ; jp.Rec.doDetailedPerfMon.set_Value_and_Lock( False ); jp.Rec.doSemiDetailedPerfMon.set_Value_and_Lock( False ); from PerfMonComps.PerfMonFlags import jobproperties ; jobproperties.PerfMonFlags.doMonitoring.set_Value_and_Lock( False ) ; jp.Rec.OutputLevel=WARNING;LVL1OutputLevel=WARNING;HLTOutputLevel=WARNING;include("TriggerTest/TriggerTestSilence.py");dsName="/eos/atlas/atlascerngroupdisk/trig-daq/validation/test_data/mc12_8TeV.119994.Pythia8_A2MSTW2008LO_minbias_inelastic.recon.RDO.e1119_a185_a187_tid00998581_00";fileRange=[0,20]' valgrind.pkl 2>&1 | sed -e '/ definitely lost: / { N; d; }' | tee Valgrind_test_log_1 ; cp /afs/cern.ch/user/c/czodrows/public/ValgrindAnalysisScript_TriggerTest.py ./ ; python ValgrindAnalysisScript_TriggerTest.py ; mv Valgrind_test_log_1 Valgrind_test_log

athena.py --config-only=valgrind.pkl TriggerTest/testCommonSliceAthenaTrigRDO.py ; cp /afs/cern.ch/user/k/krasznaa/public/valgrind/pythonJobO.supp ./ ; cp /afs/cern.ch/user/k/krasznaa/public/valgrind/reflexPyROOT.supp ./ ; cp $ROOTSYS/etc/valgrind-root.supp ./ ; get_files newSuppressions.supp; get_files oracleDB.supp; get_files root.supp; get_files valgrindRTT.supp; get_files Gaudi.supp; get_files valgrind-python.supp ; valgrind --suppressions=valgrind-root.supp --track-origins=yes --trace-children=yes --suppressions=newSuppressions.supp --suppressions=oracleDB.supp --suppressions=root.supp --suppressions=valgrindRTT.supp --suppressions=Gaudi.supp --suppressions=valgrind-python.supp --suppressions=pythonJobO.supp --suppressions=reflexPyROOT.supp --error-limit=no --tool=memcheck --leak-check=full --smc-check=all --show-reachable=yes --num-callers=30 `which athena.py` --stdcmalloc -c 'RunningRTT=True;menu="Physics_pp_v6_tight_physics_prescale";jp.AthenaCommonFlags.EvtMax.set_Value_and_Lock(2); jp.Rec.doPerfMon.set_Value_and_Lock( False ) ; jp.Rec.doDetailedPerfMon.set_Value_and_Lock( False ); jp.Rec.doSemiDetailedPerfMon.set_Value_and_Lock( False ); from PerfMonComps.PerfMonFlags import jobproperties ; jobproperties.PerfMonFlags.doMonitoring.set_Value_and_Lock( False ) ; jp.Rec.OutputLevel=WARNING;LVL1OutputLevel=WARNING;HLTOutputLevel=WARNING;include("TriggerTest/TriggerTestSilence.py");dsName="/eos/atlas/atlascerngroupdisk/trig-daq/validation/test_data/valid1.110401.PowhegPythia_P2012_ttbar_nonallhad.recon.RDO.e3099_s2578_r6727_tid05522624_00";fileRange=[1,2]' valgrind.pkl 2>&1 | sed -e '/ definitely lost: / { N; d; }' | tee Valgrind_test_log_1 ; cp /afs/cern.ch/user/c/czodrows/public/ValgrindAnalysisScript_TriggerTest.py ./ ; python ValgrindAnalysisScript_TriggerTest.py ; mv Valgrind_test_log_1 Valgrind_test_log

Physics_pp_v6_tight_physics menu - doFloatingPointException=True - on ttbar
MC_pp_v6 menu - doFloatingPointException=True - on ttbar
MC_pp_v6_loose_mc_prescale menu - doFloatingPointException=True - on minbias
MC_pp_v6_tight_mc_prescale menu - doFloatingPointException=True - on ttbar
MC_pp_v5 menu on ttbar RDO
Runs MC_pp_v5 menu on valid1.117050.PowhegPythia_P2011C_ttbar.merge.HITS.e2658_s1967_s1964 dumping 1k events in an xAOD
MC_pp_v5_tight_mc_prescale menu on ttbar RDO only 500 events
MC_pp_v5_loose_mc_prescale menu on minbias RDO
Physics_pp_v5 menu on minbias RDO
MC_pp_v6 menu on ttbar RDO
Runs MC_pp_v6 menu on valid1.117050.PowhegPythia_P2011C_ttbar.merge.HITS.e2658_s1967_s1964 dumping 1k events in an xAOD
MC_pp_v6_tight_mc_prescale menu on ttbar RDO only 500 events

Test of Physics_HI_v3 menu on RDO
Test of MC_HI_v3_tight_mc_prescale menu on RDO
Runs B-jet signature on ttbar RDO

Runs B-physics slice on user.tursom.mc12_14TeV.208410.Pythia8B_AU2_CTEQ6L1_Bs_Jpsimu6mu6_phi_KK.recon.v6_EXT0 RDOs (until Bs->J/Psi mu mu RDO mc12_8TeV.208002.Pythia8B_AU2_CTEQ6L1_pp_Jpsimu6mu6.recon.RDO.e1331_a159_a190 is availible)

Runs B-physics slice on user.tursom.mc12_14TeV.208410.Pythia8B_AU2_CTEQ6L1_Bs_Jpsimu6mu6_phi_KK.recon.v6_EXT0 RDOs (until Bs->J/Psi mu mu RDO mc12_8TeV.208002.Pythia8B_AU2_CTEQ6L1_pp_Jpsimu6mu6.recon.RDO.e1331_a159_a190 is availible)
Runs Electron signature on ttbar RDO (until RDO mc12_14TeV.147806.PowhegPythia8_AU2CT10_Zee.recon.RDO.e1564_s1682_s1691_r4710 is availible)
Runs Electron slice on ttbar RDO (until mc10_14TeV.106046.PythiaZee_no_filter.digit.RDO.e662_s1107_d459 mu=46, no IBL is availible)
Runs Tau signature on ttbar RDO (until Z tau tau RDO is availible)
Runs Jet signature on ttbar RDO
Runs MET signature on ttbar RDO
Runs MinBias signature on ttbar RDO
Runs MinBias_Enhanced signature on ttbar RDO
Runs Muon signature on ttbar RDO
LVL1 only test- with default menu

arg.argvalue: if [ -f trig_cost.root ] ; then RunTrigCostD3PD.exe -f trig_cost.root --outputTagFromAthena --monitorAllChainSeqAlg --monitorROI --monitorGlobals --monitorFullEvent --monitorROS --linkOutputDir ; else echo file trig_cost.root does not exist thus RunTrigCostD3PD.exe will not be run ; fi
